doc.title: Video Blog: Ieat learns to make Chawanmushi
doc.text: In/IN the/DT third/JJ part/NN of/IN our/PRP$ Japanese/JJ Cooking/NN Series/NN ,/, I/PRP accompany/VBD Chef/NN Tom/NN to/TO the/DT supermarket/NN where/WRB he/PRP tells/VBZ us/PRP about/IN the/DT three/CD key/NN ingredients/NNS of/IN Japanese/NN cooking/NN ,/, namely/NN shoyu/NN ,/, mirin/NN and/CC sake/NN ./. Then/RB we/PRP head/VBP back/RB to/TO the/DT kitchen/NN to/TO make/VB Chawanmushi/NN which/WDT is/VBZ one/CD of/IN my/PRP$ kids/NNS '/" favorite/JJ dishes/NNS ./. The/DT key/NN to/TO a/DT great/JJ Chawanmushi/NN is/VBZ to/TO ensure/VB that/WDT there/EX are/VBP no/RB bubbles/VBN in/IN the/DT custard/NN and/CC Chef/NN Tom/NN shows/. us/PRP how/RB simple/JJ it/PRP is/VBZ to/TO make/VB this/DT at/IN home/NN ./. For/IN the/DT one/CD bowl/NN of/IN chawanmushi/NN you/PRP buy/VB at/IN the/DT restaurant/NN ,/, you/PRP can/MD make/VB ten/CD bowls/NN at/IN home/NN !/. You/PRP would/MD be/VB amazed/VBD how/RB simple/JJ it/PRP really/RB is/VBZ !/. It/PRP 's/POS not/RB stated/VB in/IN the/DT video/NN but/CC the/DT proportion/NN of/IN egg/NN to/TO dashi/VB is/VBZ 1/CD egg/NN to/TO half/VB cup/NN of/IN dashi/NN stock/NN ./. Dashi/JJ stock/NN was/VBD covered/VBN in/IN the/DT previous/JJ video/NN on/IN Miso/NN Soup/NN ./. You/PRP can/MD learn/VB about/IN it/PRP here/RB ./. To/RB cook/VB ,/, you/PRP need/VB to/TO bring/VB the/DT water/NN to/TO the/DT boil/NN and/CC steam/NN for/IN 15/CD mins/NNS ./. For/IN the/DT rest/NN of/IN the/DT ieatvideos/JJ please/NN click/NN here/RB :/:
